mapper.update: update predetermine set predetermineStateID=#{state},remind=0 where predetermineId=#{id}
mapper.sql:
LEFT JOIN `room` roomNumber ##客房号 ON predetermine.`roomID`=roomNumber.roomid LEFT JOIN `receivetarget` receiveTeamName##接待对象 ON predetermine.`predetermineTargetID`=receiveTeamName.`receivetargetId` LEFT JOIN `passenger` passengerName ##旅客 ON predetermine.`passengerID`=passengerName.`pId` INNER JOIN attributedetails payWayName ##支付方式 ON predetermine.`payWayID`=payWayName.attributedetailsId LEFT JOIN attributedetails roomState ##客房等级 ON roomNumber.`guestRoomLevelID`=roomState.`attributedetailsId` INNER JOIN attributedetails predetermineState ##预定状态 ON predetermine.predetermineStateid=predetermineState.attributedetailsId
and roomNumber.`roomNumber` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.roomNumber},'%')
and `principal` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.receivePrincipal},'%')
and `principal` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.receivePrincipal},'%')
and `NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.passengerName},'%')
and `predetermineStateID` =#{params.predetermineStateID}
mapper.select:
SELECT predetermine.*, roomNumber.`roomNumber` roomNumber, passengerName.`name` passengerName, roomState.`attributeDetailsName` roomGuestRoomLevelName, ##客房等级 payWayName.`attributeDetailsName` payWayName, predetermineState.attributeDetailsName predetermineStateName, receiveTeamName.`contactPhoneNUmber` receiveContactPhoneNUmber, passengerName.`PhoneNumber` passengerContactPhoneNumber, receiveTeamName.`principal` receivePrincipal ##负责人 FROM predetermine
ORDER BY predetermine.predetermineId DESC limit #{qis},#{pageSize}

SELECT passenger.`name`,passenger.`pId`,passenger.phoneNumber, passenger.`papersNumber` ,genderName.`attributeDetailsName` genderName, papersName.`attributeDetailsName` papersName FROM passenger INNER JOIN `attributedetails` genderName ON genderName.`attributedetailsId`=passenger.`genderID` INNER JOIN attributedetails papersName ON papersName.`attributedetailsId`=passenger.`papersID`
and NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
